data.name: Draenei
data.description:
Draenei

Units:
+5% hit points
-5% evasion
+30% buy cost
+10% buy cooldown

Buildings:
Tower/Barracks have Mana Shield
No HP regeneration

Upgrades:
+3Lv Building Damage

Magic:
Sacred Shield (+5 armor to 1 unit)
Holy Light (100 HP to 1 unit)
Resurrection (revives 1 unit)

Traits: Strong and durable units that are rendered even stronger by healing and protecting effects of the Holy Light. No real weaknesses apart from the scarse population making each unit very costly.

Difficulty: Advanced

auras.name: Brilliance Aura
auras.description:
+0.1 MP/s to units and buildings
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Inspiration Aura
auras.description:
+10% unit damage
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Focusing Lens Aura
auras.description:
+100 building attack range
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Rangari Huntress [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Way of Shield

Rangari Huntress replaces Vindicator
Melee Unit
+10% attack rate
+25 HP
Abilities:
Crystal Blade (Orb Effect)
(burns 15 mana per hit)
(does not affect Special unit)
Shadow Stalker (Passive Skill)
(15% to do 2x and invisibility)
Upgrades used:
Arkonite Infusion
Arkonite Embedding
Gift of the Naaru
Way of Shield
Arcane Afinity

Type: Early Push

units.description:

Weak Vs Spellcaster

bonuses.name: Vindicator Class [Q]
bonuses.description:
Vindictus replaces A'dal

Special Unit (Melee/Mechanical/Air)
-20% buy cooldown
Can attack only buildings and Heroes
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Pusher
Can learn:
Crystallization (Disable Spell)
18-30 sec stun
(450-750 area of effect)
(doesn't affect Special unit)
Arkonite Lance (Passive Skill)
launches 1-7 beams at units
Purifier Beam (Damage Spell)
30-60 damage/sec
(350-400 area of effect)
(doesn't affect buildings)
Warp In (Summoning Spell)
summons up to 6-10 random units

Type: Late Game Push

bonuses.name: Lost Artifacts [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Lost Artifacts
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

bonuses.description:

Has Global Silence and Mana Leak Aura.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Anti-Magic Shield
spells.description:
Reduces spell damage to buildings by 90%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Global Silence (Lv1) [S]
spells.description:
Silences enemy units and structures for 10 sec.
(does not affect Special unit)
Cooldown: 180 seconds.

spells.name: Mana Leak Aura
spells.description:
-1.5 MP/s to enemy units.
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold bounty for killing Heroes.
(let the dumb nabs feed you...)

Type: Anti Hero

upgrades.name: Fuck Heroes (Lv1)
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+15% damage reduction
+3 armor reduction
+1000 Aura range

towerUpgrades.name: Gift of the Naaru
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: self healing ability
Affects: Vindicator, Artificer and Anchorite

Lv1: heals 150 HP over 15 sec
Lv2: heals 300 HP over 15 sec
Lv3: heals 450 HP over 15 sec
Lv4: heals 600 HP over 15 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Way of Shield
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: hit points and block
Affects: Vindicator

Lv1: +25 HP, 6% to block an attack
Lv2: +50 HP, 12% to block an attack
Lv3: +75 HP, 18% to block an attack
Lv4: +100 HP, 24% to block an attack

towerUpgrades.name: Lightning Arrows
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: area damage
Affects: Artificer
(slows units for 0.5 sec)

Lv1: 10% to do 25 damage in 150 AoE
Lv2: 20% to do 35 damage in 150 AoE
Lv3: 30% to do 45 damage in 150 AoE
Lv4: 40% to do 55 damage in 150 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Scorching Beam
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage ability
Affects: Anchorite

Lv1: 100 damage in 120 AoE
Lv2: 200 damage in 100 AoE
Lv3: 300 damage in 80 AoE
Lv4: 400 damage in 60 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Stampede
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and move speed
Affects: Elekk Rider

Lv1: +50% damage, 30 sec cooldown
Lv2: +75% damage, 25 sec cooldown
Lv3: +100% damage, 20 sec cooldown
Lv4: +125% damage, 15 sec cooldown

towerUpgrades.name: Skewer
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: cleaving attack and critical strike
Affects: Elekk Rider
(125 AoE and 1.75x damage)

Lv1: 15% cleave, 10% to crit
Lv2: 25% cleave, 20% to crit
Lv3: 35% cleave, 30% to crit
Lv4: 45% cleave, 40% to crit

towerUpgrades.name: Nether Orb
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: buff dispel and mana burn
Affects: Nether Ray
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: can hit 3 units, burns 75 mana
Lv2: can hit 4 units, burns 150 mana
Lv3: can hit 5 units, burns 225 mana
Lv4: can hit 6 units, burns 300 mana

towerUpgrades.name: Crystal Stasis
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to stun
Affects: Arkonite Lance and Arkonite Pylon
(has half duration on Heroes)

Lv1: 12% for 3 sec stun
Lv2: 24% for 3 sec stun
Lv3: 36% for 3 sec stun
Lv4: 48% for 3 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Arcane Afinity
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: spell resistance
Affects: All non-Hero units
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: -6% spell damage
Lv2: -12% spell damage
Lv3: -18% spell damage
Lv4: -24% spell damage

t1spell.name: Prism Lance [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoE.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.description:

(30 seconds on Heroes)
